duties_responsibilities.duty: Own and shape the lending strategy from ideation through deployment, fostering cross-functional partnerships and supporting strategic expansion initiatives.
Evaluate and expand data used in credit decision process, leveraging non-traditional data sources and re-engineering data elements.
Establish cross-functional partnerships with internal partners and drive new initiatives to transform the lending organization.
Prepare opportunity analysis and drive agenda through influence, ensuring new strategies are implemented accurately and as designed.
Assess and drive the performance of programs, identify new champion strategies, and make disciplined roll-out decisions.
Oversee customer research, ensure insights inform overall strategy, and influence cross-functional teams to develop and drive member engagement strategies.
Recruit, develop, motivate, and retain a high-performing, member-focused team, driving them to meet and exceed department goals and objectives.
Collaborate with peers to align on mutual priorities and enhance the credit union's image, brand, and visibility.
Participate in civic and community activities to reinforce the credit union's commitment to the communities it serves, while promoting a member-centric culture.
Attend meetings, report on areas of responsibility, and actively participate in organizational strategic planning and goal setting.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business, finance, or a related field (Master’s degree preferred)
Minimum 8 years of progressive team management experience, with a minimum of 10 years of combined experience in consumer lending, mortgage lending, digital strategy, and product development/launch
